confirmDeleteResource: The selected element will be deleted. Do you want to continue?

web.title: Web api and admin
web.detail: The project is divided into 2 main modules. The first which offers all the Rest API necessary for the functionality of the back office and frontend and the second which allows the internal management of the pizzeria via browser.

openapi.title: OpenApi
openapi.detail: All APIs are provided according to the OpenApi 3.0 specification in order to be implemented in a simple and precise way in any framework and language you intend to use.

i18n.title: Internazionalizzation
i18n.detail: Both main modules are designed for language support and those present are English and Italian. New languages can be added without any programming knowledge.

database.title: Database
database.detail: The MariaDB (MySql) and PostgreSQL databases are officially supported but using an ORM as an abstraction of data access it is possible to extend the support to other RDBMS.

opensource.title: Open source
opensource.detail: Both modules are open source and the code can be freely modified in a personal copy or in collaboration on the existing one.

android.title: Android / iOS
android.detail: To complete the management of the back office it is possible, using the API, to create native Android or iOS apps for the use of customers for the creation of orders, coupons, promotions, etc...
